section.text: *NOTE: This section has been amended by emergency legislation with identical permanent legislation that will become effective in January, 2022.*
section.heading: DC HealthCare Alliance application and recertification process.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(b) of Department of Health Care Finance Alliance Reform and Budget Transparency Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-6, Jan. 29, 2021, 68 DCR 001539).

Applicability of D.C. Law 23-251: § 401 of D.C. Law 23-251 provided that the creation of this section by § 201(b) of D.C. Law 23-251 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 5112(b) of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
